# Getting Started

**Python packages you will need:**

 - tensorflow
 - keras
 - scikit-learn
 - numpy
 - matplotlib
 - ete3

There is also an `environment.yml` file in the `hyde-cnn` repo on GitHub, which
can be used to replicate the Conda environment that was used for running all
analyses.
